page.title: 09Hollington Nurseries Ltd
page.content: Hollington Nurseries is situated in Woolton Hill and is owned by Mr.Mrs.S. Hopkinson.They bought some land and moved down from London to Woolton Hill in 1976.They own one and a half acres and have around four hundred different plant varieties.They have been entering The Chelsea Flower Show for six years and have been very successful by winning one Gold and one Silver Guilt Knightien and four other Silver medals.Their prices range from 65p to Â£70.They have forty different thymes and one hundred different medicinal plants.The nursery employs three full time and three part time workers.They have had many famous people in and hope to have more.In an average year they have around 5500 customers.They sometimes show their plants at Newbury Show and at Fetes.
